sourcesContent:
// JobCard.js import React, {useState} from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // Import Link from react-router-dom import "./JobCard.css"; import Popup from 'reactjs-popup'; import 'reactjs-popup/dist/index.css'; function JobCard({ job }) { const [showFullDescription, setShowFullDescription] = useState(false); // Function to truncate the description to the first 20 words const truncateDescription = (description) => { const words = description.split(' '); return words.slice(0, 20).join(' ') + (words.length > 20 ? '...' : ''); }; return (
Posted 16 days ago
1 applicant
Pinch Role: {job.jobRole} India
{job.jdLink}
Estimated salary: {job.maxJdSalary} - {job.minJdSalary} {job.salaryCurrencyCode}
Description:

{job.jobDetailsFromCompany}

{`Our aim is to bring comfort & convenience to families in their day-to-day household chores and then take them on a journey where they find pleasure in exploring the finer aspects of`}
{/*
Show More
*/}. Show more} position={'right center'} >
Content
{`Location: `} {job.location}
{`Experience: `} {job.minExp !== null && job.maxExp !== null ? ( {job.minExp} - {job.maxExp} years ) : job.minExp !== null ? ( {job.minExp}+ years ) : job.maxExp !== null ? ( Up to {job.maxExp} years ) : ( Not specified )}
Easy Apply
); } export default JobCard;
